title: Chroma Packs
body:
Relative to the new idea of the Chroma Packs I feel like it would be more appropriate to charge a player IP once they have purchased the skin as oppose to simply making the skin cost more real money.  I feel like spending RP to buy something it needs to change it enough to encourage people who are more conservative with the way they spend money to buy it, since there is no problem with people who enjoy spending lots of money on little things. 

IP is a resource that you gain as a result of your time playing. A player who has already spent their money on the skin should be able to spend the resource of their time to change the skin to be more to their liking as oppose to feeling like they need to spend more real money to give the skin that little colour change they wanted when they bought it.

replies.body: they'd be better off making it a reward for champion mastery. that way people would have something significant to show off their skill with a champ.
